review: Good afternoon, Vitaly! Thanks for your feedback! We do have a lot of ice in our cocktails, as ice is an integral part of cooling the drink, but you can also order a cocktail with less ice or more alcohol. The roof, on the other hand, is a bright demonstration of Podolsk authenticity, which gives the place a special charm! Have a great mood!

review: Good afternoon, thank you for taking the time to share your impressions of your visit to our Bar 1818. We are sorry you had to wait longer than usual for your order - we are working on it and thanks to your feedback we are doing better! Thank you. Our menu contains cocktails of different sizes, from 80 ml to 400 ml. Please check the details with our waiters and they will be happy to answer all your questions in order to avoid unpleasant situations in the future (: We look forward to your visit and see you again! Best regards, the team of Bar 1818.
